Question: ART Lab CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
ART Lab CES 2024

- SkinChat, a skincare advisor, is a finalist at Cosmoprof India in the innovative technology section.
- ART Lab will be part of CES 2024, showcasing the future of skincare, including SkinChat, an AI skincare advisor.
- SkinChat is an AI skincare consultant that has made it to the finals at the Cosmoprof Beauty Fair in Mumbai.
- SkinChat offers skin care consulting directly from CEO Terry Taewoong Um at Cosmoprof India from December 7th to December 9th.
- SkinChat is a promising product that was selected as a finalist by Cosmoprof India, and visitors can receive skin care consulting directly from CEO Terry Taewoong Um.
- SkinChat has been selected as a finalist at Cosmoprof India and offers the opportunity to receive skin care consulting directly from CEO Terry Taewoong Um.
